channel.title: Im portant question. MUST SEE! Rep++!
channel.description:
[b]How do I make certain monsters attack correctly? [/b]
I'm running 317 DELTA Edge4Pk Client and source.
This is Kree'arra, the armadyl godwars boss. [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/97nntf.png[/img]
Right now this is how it looks when I attack it. [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/34dmsyp.png[/img]
[u]How do I make it attack correctly?[/u]
Rep++ for any answer that lead me closer to solving this problem.

item.title: Im portant question. MUST SEE! Rep++!
item.dc:creator: @haksilence haksilence
item.description:
@haksilence wrote:

thats not an easy fix if im right. alot of attack emotes are problematic. expecialy on 317 (at least in my very limmited experience) if its not a tremendous problem for you id say just deal with it as it is sorry mate wish i could help

Read full topic
item.source: Im portant question. MUST SEE! Rep++!
